name: Deferred Query
description: Query message requesting deferred access to data when immediate response is not required or available
businessPurpose: Request data access when immediate response is not required, allowing responding systems to process queries during optimal times
timing: Sent when systems need data but can wait for response processing during off-peak hours or batch processing windows
realWorldScenarios: Overnight batch processing for patient census reports
Monthly quality metrics compilation requiring extensive data mining
Research data extraction for clinical studies with flexible timing
Insurance claims processing queries that can be processed in batches
Historical data analysis requests for trending and reporting
Cross-system data reconciliation during maintenance windows

generationRules.QRD.2: Query format code (R=record oriented, D=display oriented)
generationRules.QRD.4: Query ID for tracking deferred response
generationRules.QRF: Optional query filter for additional specificity
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Medium - deferred queries allow for comprehensive data gathering but must maintain request specificity
